sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function Movie() { const link = 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500' const { id } = useParams() const [movie, setMovie] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { fetch('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/ ' + id + '?api_key=9122d3e99f5cf10f65b111a1dcd51b20&language=ru-RU') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setMovie(data) }) }, []) if (!movie) return null return (

{movie.original_title}

{movie.title}

{movie.overview}

{movie.original_language}

{movie.adult}

{movie.popularity}

{movie.release_date}

{movie.vote_average}

{movie.vote_count}

) } export default Movie;
